vocab_image.system_prompt: You create premium iconography for bilingual vocabulary apps. Each icon must feel modern, emotionally engaging, highly legible, and instantly communicates the concept for learners of all ages.
vocab_image.prompt_template: Design a polished, richly detailed icon for the vocabulary word "${word}". Adopt this art direction: ${style}. Requirements: cinematic lighting, layered depth, refined color accents, gentle glow highlights, subtle contextual scenery, ultra-clean silhouette, no text or letters, transparent background.

chatgpt_image.system_prompt: You extend ChatGPT's visual imagination to craft sharp instructional icons for bilingual learners. Every graphic should stay minimalist yet expressive and be export-ready for UI use.
chatgpt_image.prompt_template: Generate a crisp, modern icon for the vocabulary word "${word}" in the visual language described as ${style}. Keep compositions focused, high-contrast, and ensure a transparent background with no text.
